paragraphs.text:
%sh
#make new folder in /tmp/
mkdir -p /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files
#change directory to new folder
cd /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files
# list the current working directory
pwd
#transfer the file from the sandbox to the current working directory
#hadoop fs -get /tmp/Company_URLs.txt /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files/
hadoop fs -get /tmp/test2.txt /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files/
#list the files in the folder to confirm transfer
ls
#download the files, takes 5 to 10 minutes
#wget -i Company_URLs.txt
wget -i test2.txt
ls
#rename files


#Create hadoop folder for files
#hadoop fs -mkdir /Yahoo_Stocks
#transfer files to sandbox, this will remove the downloaded files
#hadoop fs -copyFromLocal /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files/* /Yahoo_Stocks

%sh
cd /home/zeppelin/tmp/Yahoo_Files
for f in *.csv; do
    a="$(echo $f | sed s/table.csv?s=// s/)"
    print a
    mv "$f" "$a"
    done
 
    for d in *.csv; do
    b="$(echo $d | sed s/\&a=\&b=1\&c=2007\&d=0\&e=1\&f=2017\&g=d\&ignore=// s/)"
    mv "$d" "$b"
    done
ls
